full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thanks for updating the pages, please see our feedback below:

1. Can you please double-check check all links work correctly on these pages - especially the blue banner under the hero image? Those links don't seem to work.
2. For image alt text, can you please use the headline of the section the image is in? e.g. For 'Why choose Lavazza', you'd use 'Why choose Lavazza'
3. Can you please replace the 360-degree wheel on each of the pages with a stock image? For the main commercial coffee machines page, can you move the 360 wheel down to the 'The Lavazza Advantage' section - we've added comments to the copy docs for clarity.
Thanks

Natalia LagodzkaAccount Executive (mon-fri)

Rica Rosario Valencia moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Hope you had a lovely weekend!

Could you please assist us with updating the Lavazza pages with the following:

1. Update content on specific location pages, please see the below link:
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1TUnmW-g_RRQkWU3-D57iepoN0FdLXfYt?usp=sharing

2. 3XX HTTP status code
Issue description
The pages indicated in the report return a 3XX response code, meaning that a redirect is set up from such pages. The 3XX response code in itself is not a problem, but each redirect puts an additional load on the server, so it's better to remove unnecessary internal redirects.

How to fix
Make sure that the number of 3XX pages on the website does not exceed 5% of the total number of pages.

3. External links to 3XX
Issue description
Some pages that you link to from the website redirect visitors to a completely different page. Perhaps, the redirect was set up after linking out to the website, and now the link can lead visitors to another page that does not contain the information they need.

How to fix
Manually look through every external 3XX link and make sure that redirected pages contain the necessary information. If there information is there, replace the link with the new version of the URL. If the required information is not available, replace or delete the link. The full list can be found here.

Please let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks so much!

Natalia Lagodzka
Account Executive (mon-fri)

Level 2, 383 George St, Sydney NSW, 2000, Australia
